EmailTemplate.description: User announcements update for CSI 19A release- Commitment terms
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes CSI 19A sprint
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Update to commitments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains changes to contract commitment terms
Commitment terms Commitment terms will now be updated on your opportunities from member agreements. Commitment terms can be found in the Member Success section of your opportunities.
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly, Susie
